title: The One With The Sonogram at the End

questions.question: What does Monica say is an important part of a relationship?
questions.explanation: Monica says 'for us, kissing is as important as any part of it.'

questions.question: What is the name of the museum where Ross works?
questions.explanation: The scene takes place at the Museum of Prehistoric History.

questions.question: Who is the co-worker that Ross is setting up an exhibit with?
questions.explanation: Marsha is the co-worker that Ross is setting up an exhibit with.

questions.question: What is the news that Carol shares with Ross?
questions.explanation: Carol shares the news that she is pregnant with Ross.

questions.question: What is the name of the episode of Three's Company that the friends are watching?
options: The one with the guest star
questions.explanation: Chandler mentions that it's the episode of Three's Company where there's some kind of misunderstanding.

questions.question: Why is Rachel looking for her engagement ring?
options: She wants to wear it to a party
She wants to give it back to Barry
She wants to show it to her friends
She wants to get it appraised
questions.correct_answer: She wants to give it back to Barry
questions.explanation: Rachel is looking for her engagement ring because she needs to return it to Barry.

questions.question: What is the object that Chandler uses to write a note to himself?
questions.explanation: Chandler writes a note to himself and then balls up the paper.

options: To apologize for his past behavior
questions.explanation: Ross visits Carol's OB/GYN to attend the sonogram.

questions.question: What is the name that Carol suggests for the baby if it's a girl?
questions.explanation: Carol suggests the name Minnie for the baby if it's a girl.

questions.question: What is the reaction of Ross's parents when they find out about Carol's pregnancy?
questions.explanation: Ross's parents are shocked and upset when they find out about Carol's pregnancy.

questions.question: Who is the person that Barry is now in a relationship with?
questions.explanation: Barry is now in a relationship with Mindy, Rachel's maid of honor.

options: To congratulate her on her relationship with Barry
To make a joke about Barry's hairline and her nose
questions.correct_answer: To make a joke about Barry's hairline and her nose

questions.explanation: Ross suggests the name Julia for the baby if it's a girl.

questions.question: What is the reaction of Monica when she finds out that she is going to be an aunt?
questions.explanation: Monica starts to cry when she finds out that she is going to be an aunt.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's decision to attend the sonogram?
options: He wants to support Carol and Susan
He wants to see the baby
He feels obligated to be there
He wants to prove a point to his parents
questions.correct_answer: He wants to see the baby
questions.explanation: Ross decides to attend the sonogram because he wants to see the baby.

questions.question: What is the name of the doctor that Carol is seeing?
questions.explanation: The doctor that Carol is seeing is Dr. Oberman.

questions.question: What is the object that Rachel is looking at when she is talking to Barry?
questions.explanation: Rachel is looking at a mirror when she is talking to Barry.

options: He is trying to relate to Ross's situation
